author: jeongeun
body:
#### PR description: 
Optimization of the python configurations: Improve maintainability by cleaning up the duplicated and cloning from the default/reference configurations. (The previous PRs : #33207, #33307, #33352, #33543, #33563, #33671, #34007, #34091, #34009, #34155, #34371, #34480, #34543, #34571, #34817, #34818, #34834, #34955 )
 
In this PR, 2 files changed.  

        modified:   PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/python/producersLayer1/electronProducer_cfi.py
        modified:   PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/python/producersLayer1/photonProducer_cfi.py


Update
- Replace explicit configuration with a reference from cfipython/. (migrating EDProducer("type", .. -> typeDefaylt.clone() ) 
- Remove the type specifications already presented in cfipython/fillDescriptions reference for improved syntax safety.

#### PR validation:
Event Content comparison check was also done and there is no change with these updates.
Tested in CMSSW_12_1_X, the basic test all passed in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Migrate module configuration in PhysicsTools to use default cfipython
